ecommerce_sales.description: 6 months of e-commerce sales data across regions, product categories, and customer segments

sample_questions.question: What are our strongest performing regions and why?
sample_questions.expected_insight: West Coast leads with 35% higher revenue per customer, driven by Premium segment adoption
sample_questions.demonstrates: Geographic analysis with customer segmentation insights

sample_questions.question: Show me seasonal patterns in our sales data
sample_questions.expected_insight: Q4 shows 240% spike in Electronics, while Clothing remains steady year-round
sample_questions.demonstrates: Time series analysis with category breakdown

sample_questions.question: Which product categories drive the most revenue?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Electronics: 65% of revenue, highest margins. Clothing: 25% steady volume. Books: declining trend
sample_questions.demonstrates: Category performance analysis with trend identification

sample_questions.question: Are there differences between customer segments?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Enterprise customers: 3x higher average order value but 40% longer sales cycles
sample_questions.demonstrates: Customer segmentation analysis with behavioral patterns

sample_questions.question: What insights can you provide about our sales performance?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Multi-dimensional analysis covering regional, temporal, and categorical patterns
sample_questions.demonstrates: Comprehensive business intelligence synthesis

marketing_campaigns.description: Marketing campaign performance across multiple channels and campaign types

sample_questions.question: Which marketing channels give us the best return on investment?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Email: 450% ROI, Social Media: 220% ROI, Paid Search: 180% ROI but highest volume
sample_questions.demonstrates: ROI calculation and channel comparison

sample_questions.question: Show me the relationship between budget and conversions
sample_questions.expected_insight: Strong correlation (0.78) up to $10K budget, then diminishing returns above $15K
sample_questions.demonstrates: Spend efficiency analysis with optimization recommendations

sample_questions.question: What's our most cost-effective acquisition channel?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Email: $12 cost per conversion, Social: $28, Paid Search: $45 but brings highest-value customers
sample_questions.demonstrates: Cost per acquisition analysis with customer value considerations

sample_questions.question: Are there patterns in campaign performance by type?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Product launches: highest engagement, Retargeting: best conversion rates, Brand awareness: lowest immediate ROI
sample_questions.demonstrates: Campaign type effectiveness analysis

sample_questions.question: How can we optimize our marketing budget allocation?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Increase email by 40%, maintain social for reach, reduce paid search spend above $10K threshold
sample_questions.demonstrates: Budget optimization recommendations based on performance data

employee_analytics.description: Employee performance, satisfaction, and development data across departments

sample_questions.question: What factors correlate most strongly with employee performance?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Training hours (0.72 correlation), years of experience (0.58), satisfaction score (0.61)
sample_questions.demonstrates: Multi-factor correlation analysis with performance drivers

sample_questions.question: Are there significant differences between departments?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Engineering: highest satisfaction (4.2/5), Sales: highest performance variance, Marketing: best training ROI
sample_questions.demonstrates: Department comparison analysis across multiple metrics

sample_questions.question: Does our training investment pay off in performance gains?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Every 10 training hours correlates with 0.3 point performance increase; ROI peaks at 40 hours annually
sample_questions.demonstrates: Training effectiveness analysis with optimal investment levels

sample_questions.question: What insights can you provide about salary vs performance?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Moderate correlation (0.45); some high performers underpaid, suggesting retention risk in Engineering
sample_questions.demonstrates: Compensation analysis with retention risk identification

sample_questions.question: Which employees might be at risk for turnover?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Low satisfaction + high performance + below-median salary = 15 employees flagged for retention focus
sample_questions.demonstrates: Predictive analytics for HR intervention

support_tickets.description: Customer support ticket data with resolution times, priorities, and satisfaction scores

sample_questions.question: What patterns do you see in our support ticket resolution times?
sample_questions.expected_insight: High priority: 2.3 hrs avg, Medium: 18 hrs, Low: 72 hrs. 85% meet SLA except Technical category
sample_questions.demonstrates: Operational performance analysis with SLA tracking

sample_questions.question: How does ticket priority affect resolution speed?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Priority system working well: 10x faster resolution for High vs Low, but Medium tickets often delayed
sample_questions.demonstrates: Priority system effectiveness analysis

sample_questions.question: Which support categories are most challenging for our team?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Technical Issues: 45% longer resolution, 20% lower satisfaction. Billing: fastest resolution, highest satisfaction
sample_questions.demonstrates: Category difficulty analysis with resource allocation insights

sample_questions.question: Are there agent performance differences?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Top agents: 30% faster resolution + 15% higher satisfaction. Training opportunity identified for 3 agents
sample_questions.demonstrates: Individual performance analysis with development recommendations

sample_questions.question: What trends do you see in our support workload?
sample_questions.expected_insight: Monday peak (40% higher volume), Technical issues increasing 15% monthly, satisfaction improving overall
sample_questions.demonstrates: Workload forecasting and trend analysis

effective_questions: Start with 'What patterns do you see...' for broad analysis
Ask 'Show me the relationship between...' for correlation analysis
Use 'Which [category] performs best...' for comparative analysis
Try 'What insights can you provide about...' for comprehensive analysis
Ask 'How can we optimize...' for actionable recommendations

question_patterns.exploratory: What patterns/insights/trends do you see in...
question_patterns.correlational: Show me the relationship between X and Y
